Here's a step-by-step explanation of the solution:

From clue 13, the snowmobile is on the far left or right. From clue 1, hip-hop is on the far right. So, the snowmobile must be on the far left (position 1).

From clue 3, time-travel movies are in the middle (position 4). From clue 10, ambient music is to the left of time-travel movies, so it's in position 3.

From clue 19, hip-hop is to the right of fantasy movies. Since hip-hop is in position 7, fantasy must be in position 6 or less. But from clue 15, D&B (which is in position 5) watches sports movies. So, fantasy can't be in position 5 or 6. Thus, fantasy is in position 2.

From clue 14, jazz is on the left or right of hip-hop. Since hip-hop is in position 7, jazz must be in position 5 or 6. But from clue 12, jazz is on the left or right of the train. So, jazz can't be in position 6 (which has roller transport). Thus, jazz is in position 2 or less. But fantasy is already in position 2, so jazz must be in position 1 or less. Since snowmobile is already in position 1, jazz must be on the right of the train.

From clue 5, tram is in an even position (2, 4, or 6). From clue 6, folk music is on the left or right of the tram. But from clue 18, quad-bike watches folk music. So, the tram can't be in position 2 (which has fantasy movies and no quad-bike). Thus, the tram must be in position 4 or less. Since time-travel movies are already in position 4, the tram must be in an earlier even position, i.e., position 2.

From clue 9, snowmobile is on the left or right of the roller. But from clue 8, roller watches sports movies. And from clue 15, D&B (which is in position 5) watches sports movies. So, roller must be in position 6.

The rest of the solution can be filled in using the remaining clues:

- Crime movies are in position 7 since no other movie genre fits.
- Bus transport is in position 7 since no other transport fits.
- Horror movies watch van (clue 4) which is to the right of bus (clue 17).
- Disco music is in position 4, as it's the only remaining music genre that fits.
